CustomField.formula: IF (OR(AND((ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c,"In Effect")),NOT(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status__c,"Being Renewed")),NOT(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status__c,"Being Amended")), IF(Apttus__Related_Opportunity__c!=NULL,AND(NOT(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Related_Opportunity__r.StageName,"Closed Lost")),NOT(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Related_Opportunity__r.StageName,"Closed Disqualified")),NOT(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Related_Opportunity__r.StageName,"Closed Duplicate"))),TRUE))), HYPERLINK("/apex/APT_AmendRenew?agreementId=" & Id & "&actionName=Renew", IMAGE("/resource/Apttus__Button_Renew", "Renew"),"_self"), NULL)
CustomField.label: Renew
